original_text: For the chambers on the outer court were fifty cubits long, while those opposite the nave were a hundred cubits long.
korean_text: 바깥뜰로 향한 방의 길이는 쉰 척이며 성전 앞을 향한 방은 백 척이며

sentences.original_text: For the chambers on the outer court were fifty cubits long
sentences.korean_translation: 바깥뜰에 있는 방들은 길이가 오십 규빗이었는데

sentences.original_text: while those opposite the nave were a hundred cubits long
sentences.korean_translation: 성소 맞은편의 방들은 길이가 백 규빗이었습니다
